parameters:
"Voc棚 pegou todos os 33 rel坦gios que estavam em seu caminho? Nossa, voc棚 realmente se dedicou!
Isso 辿 mais que suficiente, daria para ir e voltar algumas vezes!"

"Voc棚 pegou" + ToString(GlobalVariable(RelogiosColetados)) + " rel坦gios! N達o s達o todos que apareceram em seu caminho, mas ainda assim 辿 muito.
Isso 辿 o suficiente para 2 usos do portal, ent達o fica tranquilo que voc棚 chegar叩 bem!"
"Voc棚 pegou" + ToString(GlobalVariable(RelogiosColetados)) + " rel坦gios. Isso 辿 pouco, mas 辿 suficiente para ir com seguran巽a."

"Voc棚 pegou s坦" + ToString(GlobalVariable(RelogiosColetados)) + " rel坦gios. Isso 辿 muito pouco, n達o 辿 suficiente.
Eu vou completar com uns rel坦gios que eu achei no cofre do castelo, mas eu posso acabar tendo problemas aqui por causa disso."

"Voc棚 n達o pegou nenhum rel坦gio? T叩 de brincadeira? Que absurdo!
Eu vou usar uns rel坦gios que eu achei no cofre do castelo, mas eu posso acabar tendo problemas aqui por causa disso. Voc棚 devia ter se dedicado mais."

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Gruk
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
This behavior moves an object (like an enemy) for a chosen time or distance, then flips it and starts over, moving the object back and forth, vertically or horizontally.

Note: animations should be facing **Left** (for horizontal) or **Down** (for vertical) direction.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: TimedBackAndForthMovement
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: This behavior moves an object (like an enemy) for a chosen time or distance, then flips it and starts over, moving the object back and forth, vertically or horizontally.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.tags: enemy, movement, back, forth, up, down, left, right

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Move an object (e.g. enemy) for a chosen time or distance, then flip it and start over. 
Note: animations should be facing LEFT.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: TimedBackAndForthMirroredMovement

events.comment: vertical mode
horizontal mode

propertyDescriptors.label: Move the object vertically (instead of horizontally)
propertyDescriptors.name: Vertical

propertyDescriptors.label: position of the sprite at the previous frame
propertyDescriptors.name: LastPosition

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Add actions and conditions to manage the life of the object. Object can get damages, lose some health and you can check with a condition if it's dead.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.fullName: Health (life points and damages for objects)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Health
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Add actions and conditions to manage the life of the object. Object can get damages, lose some health and you can check with a condition if it's dead.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Add actions and conditions to manage the life of the object. Object can get damages, lose some health and you can check with a condition if it's dead.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Health

eventsFunctions.description: Add some damage to the object, decreasing its life.
eventsFunctions.name: Hit

parameters.description: Value of the damage to do (will be removed from object health)
parameters.name: DamageValue

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object is considered dead (no more health)
eventsFunctions.name: IsDead

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object was just damaged previously in the events.
eventsFunctions.name: IsJustDamaged

eventsFunctions.description: Heal the object, incrasing its life.
eventsFunctions.name: Heal

parameters.description: How much to heal (will be added to object health)
parameters.name: HealValue

eventsFunctions.description: Change the object health to set it to a specific value (check if the actions to damage or heal the object are not better suited to your use case before using this one).
eventsFunctions.name: SetHealth

propertyDescriptors.label: Damage cooldown (in seconds) (0 for no cooldown)
propertyDescriptors.name: DamageCooldown

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allow the object to fire bullets, with customizable speed, angle and fire rate.

parameters.description: Speed of the bullet, in pixels per second
parameters.name: Speed
